arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of parameter group

description.description: The description of the Redshift parameter group. Defaults to "Managed by Pulumi".

family.description: The family of the Redshift parameter group.

name.description: The name of the Redshift parameter.

parameters.description: A list of Redshift parameters to apply.

tags.description:
A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

You can read more about the parameters that Redshift supports in the [documentation](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/mgmt/working-with-parameter-groups.html)

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
